io.prometheus.client.metrics

Class Gauge

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.prometheus.client.metrics.Metric<Gauge,Gauge.Child,Gauge.Partial>
      • io.prometheus.client.metrics.Gauge

  • @ThreadSafe
public class Gauge
extends Metric<Gauge,Gauge.Child,Gauge.Partial>

    Gauge is a Metric that reports instantaneous values based on external state.

    • Instantaneous value: The amount of money currently in the room. The value comes from a blackbox system that can only return the state result; it does not return how the state was derived.

    An example follows: 

     package example;

 import io.prometheus.client.Prometheus;
 import io.prometheus.client.Register;
 import io.prometheus.client.metrics.Counter;

 public class Aquarium {
   // Annotate this with "Register" if this class is not explicitly loaded
   // by your project.
   private static final Gauge waterTemp = Gauge.newBuilder()
     .namespace("seaworld")
     .inSubsystem("aquatic_tanks")
     .name("water_temperature_c")
     .labelNames("tank_name")
     .documentation("The current aquarium tank temperature partitioned by tank name.")
     .build()

   public void run() {
     while (true) {
       // Busy loop.  :sad-trombone:
       waterTemp.newPartial()
         .labelPair("tank_name", "shamu")
         .apply()
         .set(getShamuTemperature());

       waterTemp.newPartial()
         .labelPair("tank_name", "urchin")
         .apply()
         .set(getUrchinTemperature());
     }
   }

   private double getShamuTemperature() {
       // That poor orca's boiling alive!
       return 42;
   }

   private double getUrchinTemperature() {
       return 9;
   }
 }

    Assuming that each code path is executed once, waterTemp yields the following child metrics: 

       seaworld_aquatic_tanks_water_temperature_c{tank_name="shamu"}  = 42
   seaworld_aquatic_tanks_water_temperature_c{tank_name="urchin"} = 9

    Note:To represent whitebox values inside of business logic control, use Counter.

    Author:
    Matt T. Proud (matt.proud@gmail.com)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Gauge.Builder
      Define the characteristics for this Gauge.
      class  Gauge.Child
      A concrete instance of Gauge for a unique set of label dimensions.
      class  Gauge.Partial
      A derivative of Gauge that lets you accumulate labels to build a concrete metric via Gauge.Partial.apply() for mutation with the methods of Gauge.Child.
      static class  Gauge.Serializer
      Used to serialize Gauge instances for Gson.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class io.prometheus.client.metrics.Metric

        Metric.IllegalLabelDeclarationException
